fields.name: Natural face/body soap
fields.description: Two handmade soap bars, made with a natural blend of essential oils and gentle ingredients such as oats, shea butter and seaweed.

fields.name: Bamboo toothbrush set
fields.description: A natural bamboo toothbrush with tooth cleaning powder, a more sustainable way to brush your teeth. This set includes 1 bamboo toothbrush and 1 pot of our natural powdered toothpaste

fields.name: Bamboo toothbrush set - Family pack
fields.description: 4 natural bamboo toothbrushes with tooth cleaning powder, a more sustainable way for your family to brush they're teeth. This set includes 4 bamboo toothbrushes and 2 pots of our natural powdered toothpaste

fields.name: Natural Body brush
fields.description: A natural bristle body brush, used for daily exfoliation. This brush is a great tool for exfoliating dull skin without the use of any harsh chemicals. To use: brush in upwards strokes, starting from the soles of your feet, moving towards your heart. Do not use on broken or sensitive skin

fields.name: Jade facial roller
fields.description: A Jade facial roller, used for facial massage. This roller is a great addition to any skincare routine. It helps to sculpt and tone the face. To use: After applying a facial oil or serum, roll the face lightly in an upward motion

fields.name: Body care set
fields.description: A set of essential sustainable body care items. This set includes 1 bamboo toothbrush, 1 pot of our powdered toothpaste, 1 bar of natural soap, 1 bamboo nail brush and a pack of organic ear buds

fields.name: Shower set
fields.description: A 5 piece set of sustainable natural products for showering. This set consists of 2 fluffy bath towels, made using recycled and organic materials, A back scrubber and body scrubber, both created using natural sustainable materials and finally 1 bar of our gentle homemade soap, which can be used on hair/body/face.

fields.name: Body buffing set
fields.description: A 5 piece set of sustainable natural products for buffing and washing away any dry skin. This set consists of a body brush with handle, for exfoliating the whole body, A body washer and nail brush, for deep cleaning, A handmade reusable bag (toilet roll not included) and finally 1 bar of our gentle homemade soap, which can be used on hair/body/face.

fields.name: Rose quartz
fields.description: Rose quartz is the stone of love. A beautiful healing crystal, which can help to heal the heart and root chakra. 1 piece of rose quartz is included.

fields.name: Rose quartz set
fields.description: Rose quartz is the stone of love. A beautiful healing crystal, which can help to heal the heart and root chakra. 3 pieces of rose quartz is included.

fields.name: Amethyst set
fields.description: Amethyst is a powerful and protective stone. A beautiful crystal, which is knows to alleviate physical and mental pain. 3 pieces of amethyst is included.

fields.name: Rose quartz and Amethyst set
fields.description: Rose quartz is the stone of love. A beautiful healing crystal, which can help to heal the heart and root chakra. Amethyst is a powerful and protective stone. A beautiful crystal, which is knows to alleviate physical and mental pain. 3 pieces of rose quartz and 3 pieces of Amethyst are included.

fields.name: Cleansing Set
fields.description: A powerful combination of: palo santo - Traditionally used to help with colds and flu and also energy cleansing. Light for 30 seconds and allow smoke to circulate in desired area. Sage- Also used for cleansing both energetically and physically. Light and allow smoke to circulate through desired area. Rose quartz -the stone of love. A beautiful healing crystal, which can help to heal the heart and root chakra.

fields.name: Granite Buddha statue
fields.description: A beautiful granite piece. Marble stand not included

fields.name: Buddha statue set
fields.description: This set is a beautiful collection of Buddha statues. Whilst often used for decorative purposes, these statues religious meanings should be respected
